content: Go back down the stairs, and when you're almost at the bottom, look to the right to find another **Purple Lingzhi y** ou can harvest. Continue on, then turn right and follow the path.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Woods_of_Ember_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Woods of Ember Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Camp of Seasons' and the sub-subsection 'Tip!'.
The content is as follows:
Go back down the stairs, and when you're almost at the bottom, look to the right to find another **Purple Lingzhi y** ou can harvest. Continue on, then turn right and follow the path.
